price: نو فرعون له خپلو لښكرو سره ورپسې شو چې بيا د سيند هغه څه ورباندې راخپور شو كوم چې پرې راخپور شوى و.
arabic: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِهِۦ فَغَشِيَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡيَمِّ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fa-atbaʿahum fir'ʿawnu bijunūdihi faghashiyahum mina al-yami mā ghashiyahum
